mapper.select: select slideshow_path slideshowPath, goods_id goodsId from t_info_slideshow_home where is_delete = 0 and slideshow_state_id = 1 and now() >= start_time and end_time >= now() order by slideshow_num

select h.goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, goods_image_path goodsImagePath, goods_price goodsPrice from t_info_hot_goods h left join t_info_goods g on h.goods_id = g.goods_id where g.is_delete = 0 and now() >= start_time and end_time >= now() order by hot_goods_num
